price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߕߌ߲ߓߌߘߌ߲ߘߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߛߌ߫ ߞߟߌ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
